name: Imperial Dragon Wyrmling
senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 15

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Lightning Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales lightning in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting (1/Day)
special_abilities.desc: The dragon can innately cast fog cloud, requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.
